title: SMC_GroupAdditionalAxesTargetPositions (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupAdditionalAxesTargetPositions
This function block returns the commanded target position
of an axis groupâs additional axes.
There are several reasons why the output
Valid
may be
FALSE
:
The last commanded movement is a halt / stop and has not been
processed yet.
The last commanded movement is relative and its start-position
is not known yet (e.g. because the preceding movement is a halt / stop).
This is an administrative FB, since no movement is generated.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Continuously reads the target positions of the additional axes
whileTRUE.

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
Target positions of the groupâs additional axes.
